mapper.insert: insert into nb_note_t (noteid, bookid, remark, title, content, photo, createtime, UUID) values (#{noteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update nb_note_t set bookid = #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where noteid = #{noteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select noteid, bookid, remark, title, content, photo, createtime, UUID from nb_note_t
select noteid, bookid, remark, title, content, photo, createtime, UUID from nb_note_t where (title like "%${keyword}%" and UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
select noteid, bookid, remark, title, content, photo, createtime, UUID from nb_note_t where (bookid = #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
